      • usetM4F

        public void usetM4F(java.lang.String name,
                    boolean transpose,
                    float[] matrix)
        Loads a vec4 value into a uniform variable of the program object that is currently in use.
        Parameters:
        name - String; the uniform variable name
        transpose - boolean; (false) specifies column major order or, row major order row
        matrix - float[]; the matrix source to be applied
